column2: some groups seek to prevent the use of genetic engineering
column3: and even try to misinform the public about the approach. One of the most common misunderstandings about genetic engineering is the belief that changing the DNA of an organism is unnatural and therefore wrong. However
column4: Agrobacterium has been modifying the DNA of plants long before humans learned how to do it. This shows us that changing DNA sequences is a natural process and part of the world around us. By using Agrobacterium to modify plant DNA
column5: we are harnessing a natural process to develop crop plants that need fewer pesticides
column7: and that yield more food using less land. Using less land is a really important consideration because
column8: if we want to avoid the destruction of natural ecosystems
